snippet.title: The Test Game - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
My first game ever created! The Test Game

Find it on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3102790/The_Test_Game/

You and your wife had a little accident while fishing... You got stuck on an abandoned island. To escape, you have to collect points, food, and resources. You'll have to fight to survive. The clock is ticking. How fast can you escape the island? Explore the colorful underwater world to find time points and finish your task of escaping even faster. Talk to your wife if you don't know how to proceed. Unlock some in game achievements by beating a time score.

Cheers
